t:
That's it, thank you for using the tutorial! 

Press [h] to access Help to discover more features.
Only you can see the line while dragging. To share it with other players, press [Space]. It will disappear after a few seconds.
Use Measure-mode to check line-of-sight/LOS. Press [m] or click on the ruler icon. Then drag a line with your left mouse button.
In the settings you can also change the table size or re-align the content if you're out of space.
You can change the appearance of your room in the settings. Press [Shift]-[S] or click the black icon to the top-left.
You can also point somewhere and press [Space]. The laser-pointer will disappear after a few seconds.
There is a laser-pointer to draw other player's attention. Just [Shift]-Click somewhere on the table.
Now let's explore a few more useful features.
